    A little change in the blog,

    less than 1 minute read

    On This Page

    From now on every R related post will be posted there: http://rpubs.com/Lionel Since it is very nice and easy for me to upload R code and graphics using Rmarkdown files to this website (easier than to work with wordpress), I will still make notice from this blog.

    Updated: March 30, 2013
